data.title: Sister Act casting announced
data.meta_description: After a year long global search, 24 year-old US actress Patina Miller has been cast to make her West End debut playing the lead role of Deloris Van Cartier in the divine new musical comedy SISTER ACT
data.meta_site_name: West End Theatre | London theatre tickets and West End shows | West End Theatre
data.text:
After a year long global search, 24 year-old US actress Patina Miller has been cast to make her West End debut playing the lead role of â€˜Deloris Van Cartierâ€™ in the divine new musical comedy â€œSISTER ACTâ€. Born and raised in South Carolina, Patinaâ€™s previous credits include the critically acclaimed 2008 production of Hair in New York. The role of Deloris in â€œSISTER ACTâ€ was made famous by Whoopi Goldberg in the movie of the same name, and Goldberg is a co-producer of the stage version.

Starring alongside Patina will be Sheila Hancock as â€˜Mother Superiorâ€™. To many, a national treasure and a multi-BAFTA nominee, Sheilaâ€™s career spans theatre, television, radio and film and she won a 2007 Olivier Award for her performance in Cabaret. Dadâ€™s Army and EastEnders actor Ian Lavender also stars as â€˜Monsignor Howardâ€™. â€œSISTER ACTâ€ opens at the London Palladium on 2 June, following previews from 7 May.

Whoopi Goldberg says:

â€œI am proud to announce that weâ€™ve finally found you an amazing girl to play Deloris. It wasnâ€™t easy, but we did it. And boy, can she sing (unlike some people we know â€“ me!). And in order to match her, we went for the best and we got the brilliantâ€¦ Sheila Hancock is our Mother Superior, a legend and not just in my mind. I think together they will reinvent SISTER ACT and bring it to a whole new levelâ€¦can you tell Iâ€™m excited?â€

Also starring in â€œSISTER ACTâ€ will be Chris Jarman as â€˜Shankâ€™, Ako Mitchell as â€˜Eddieâ€™, Katie Rowley Jones as â€˜Sister Mary Robertâ€™, Claire Greenway as â€˜Sister Mary Patrickâ€™ and Julia Sutton as â€˜Sister Mary Lazarusâ€™, Thomas Goodridge as â€˜TJâ€™, Nicolas Colicos as â€˜Bonesâ€™ and Ivan De Freitas as â€˜Dineroâ€™. The cast also includes Vanessa Barmby, Amy Booth-Steel, Julian Cannonier, Ben Clare, Helen Colby, Kate Coyston, Jennie Dale, Jaymz Denning, Nia Fisher, Alison Harding, Paul Kemble, Debbie Kurup, George Long, Hugh Maynard, Jo Napthine, Aysa Oâ€™Flaherty, Landi Oshinowo, Verity Quade, Helen Walsh and Emma Woods.

â€œSISTER ACTâ€ features a score by Alan Menken, eight-time Oscar winner and composer of many of the world famous songs from Disneyâ€™s movies, including The Little Mermaid, Beauty & The Beast, Aladdin and Enchanted, with lyrics from his long- time collaborator Glenn Slater. The book is by the award-winning team Cheri and Bill Steinkellner, whose writing credits include the classic television comedy Cheers, and the production is directed by Peter Schneider.

â€œSISTER ACTâ€has musical supervision by Michael Kosarin, choreography by Anthony Van Laast, set design by Klara Zieglerova, costume design by Lez Brotherston, sound design by Mick Potter, lighting design by Natasha Katz and musical direction by Nicholas Skilbeck.

â€œSISTER ACTâ€ is produced in London by Whoopi Goldberg and Stage Entertainment, producers of Hairspray, Strictly Come Dancing The Live Tour!, High School Musical and Saturday Night Fever.
